items.title: Sox to open next season on road vs. Rays
items.summary: The Red Sox won't have to travel far for the start of the 2018 season, as they will take the two-hour bus ride from their Spring Training base in Fort Myers, Fla., to Tropicana Field for Opening Day against the Rays on March 29.
items.content: The Red Sox won't have to travel far for the start of the 2018 season, as they will take the two-hour bus ride from their Spring Training base in Fort Myers, Fla., to Tropicana Field for Opening Day against the Rays on March 29.

alternate.title: Sox to open next season on road vs. Rays
